nodes.text: Sir Nevil Tritum was the most skilled agent of the Mecrosa Order.

During the Great Jedi Purge, Tritum was responsible for infiltrating House Pelagia's holocron library and bringing King Adas's holocron back into Sith hands. Despite being unable to touch the Force, Tritum's recovery of the artifact also resulted in the deaths of three Pelagian Jedi.
